import React from "react"; import withContext from "../withContext"; const About = props => { return(

About

This project was made using the art database of the Art Institute of Chicago's public API. They have an excellent collection of some of the most renowned pieces and collections which I narrowed down to a few that stuck out to me and were public domain. The idea started by pulling the paintings directly from the API which I eventually moved to Firestore database.



The programming of this project is using React router, Firebase Firestore database, Firebase user authentication, and

My Website
) } export default withContext(About)
